htsjdk.variant.vcf

Class VCFEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • htsjdk.variant.vcf.VCFEncoder

  • public class VCFEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
    Functions specific to encoding VCF records.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.nio.charset.Charset VCF_CHARSET
      The encoding used for VCF files: ISO-8859-1

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VCFEncoder(VCFHeader header, boolean allowMissingFieldsInHeader, boolean outputTrailingFormatFields)
      Prepare a VCFEncoder that will encode records appropriate to the given VCF header, optionally allowing missing fields in the header.
